settings.title: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept most major credit cards, as well as PayPal and other secure online payment methods.

settings.title: How long does it take for delivery?
settings.answer: Delivery times may vary based on your location and the specific items ordered. Generally, orders are processed and shipped within a few business days, and delivery takes between 3-7 business days after that.

settings.title: Can I return or exchange a product?
settings.answer: Yes, we accept returns or exchanges within a certain period of time after purchase. Please see our Returns Policy for more information.

settings.title: Where can you ship to?
settings.answer: We can ship to everywhere in Canada and US.

settings.title: Are your products official and licensed?
settings.answer: Yes, all our products are officially licensed and sourced from reputable manufacturers and distributors.

settings.title: How can I contact customer service?
settings.answer: You can reach our customer service team by email at info@prexhobby.com or by phone at 6044180906. We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.

settings.title: What if an item is out of stock?
settings.answer: If an item is out of stock, you can usually sign up to be notified when it becomes available again. We do our best to restock popular items as quickly as possible.
